label.name: Introduction
label.description: Description narrative pour l'ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public de l'élément.

label.name: Introduktion
label.description: Berättande beskrivning, för gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Description de l'objet
label.description: Description narrative pour un élément de cet ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public d'un élément dans le contexte de cet ensemble.

label.name: Post beskrivning
label.description: Berättande beskrivning för poster i denna gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när poster i grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Type de présentation
label.description: Détermine comment l'ensemble est affiché dans le catalogue public Pawtucket/Pawtucket2.

label.name: Presentation typ
label.description: Bestämmer hur gruppering återges när den visas för allmänheten i Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Est l'item principal de l'ensemble ?
label.description: L'item marqué comme principal sera utilisé pour représenter l'ensemble comme un tout dans l'affichage d'une liste d'ensembles.

label.name: Är det primära objektet för gruppering?
label.description: Objekt markerad som primär kommer att användas för att representera grupperingen i sin helhet när det ingår i en lista över grupperingar.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Rights
label.description: A text statement regarding copyright and use permission.

settings.setting: Copyright to this resource is held by [copy right holder name] and is provided here for educational purposes only. It may not be downloaded, reproduced or distributed in any format without written permission of [copy right holder name]. Any attempt to circumvent the access controls place on this file is a violation of United States and international copyright laws, and is subject to criminal prosecution.

label.name: Rights Holder
label.description: To identify the person or organisation holding or managing the rights related to the resource.

label.name: Copyright Statement
label.description: Use to state copyright statements over the resource.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of description
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Notes
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Repository
label.description: This element identifies the name and location of the repository that hold the materials being described.

label.name: Date
label.description: This element identifies and records the date(s) that pertain to the creation, assembly, accumulation, and/or maintenance and use of the materials being described.

label.name: Extent
label.description: This element indicates the extent and the physical nature of the materials being described.

label.name: Administrative/Biographical History Element
label.description: A description of the context in which the materials being described were created, assembled, and/or maintained is as important as the description of the materials themselves

label.name: Scope and Content
label.description: This element provides information about the nature of the materials and activities reflected in the unit being described to enable users to judge its potential relevance.

label.name: System of Arrangement
label.description: This element identifies the various aggregations of archival materials, their relationships, or the sequence of documents within them.

label.name: Conditions Governing Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to the nature of the information in the materials being described, such as those imposed by the donor, by the repository, or by statutory/regulatory requirements.

label.name: Physical Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any physical characteristics or storage locations that limit, restrict, delay, or otherwise affect access to the materials being described.

label.name: Technical Access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any technical requirements restrict or otherwise affect access to the materials being described, such as equipment or specific hardware/software required for use.

label.name: Conditions Governing Reproduction
label.description: This element identifies any restrictions on reproduction due to copyright or other reasons, as well as restrictions on further use of the materials being described, such as publication after access has been provided.

label.name: Languages and Scripts on the Material
label.description: This element identifies the language(s), script(s), and symbol systems employed in the materials being described, particularly as they may affect its use.

label.name: Other Finding Aids
label.description: This element identifies any other finding aids to the materials being described particularly if they are available to the user, and provides information about the form and content of those finding aids.

label.name: Existence and Location of Originals
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of originals when the materials being described consist of copies, and the originals are not held by the repository

label.name: Existence and Location of Copies
label.description: This element indicates the existence, location, and availability of copies or other reproductions of the materials being described when they are available for use in an institution, or for loan or purchase, or available electronically. Do not mention copies in private hands or copies made for personal use.

label.name: Related Archival Materials
label.description: This element indicates the existence and location of archival materials that are closely related to the materials being described by provenance, sphere of activity, or subject matter, either in the same repository, in other repositories, or elseware.

label.name: Publication Note
label.description: This element identifies any publications that are about or are based on the use, study, or analysis of the materials being described.

label.name: Notes
label.description: This element provides information that cannot be accommodated in any of the defined elements of description.

label.name: Description Control
label.description: The purpose of this element is to document the creation and revision of archival descriptive records.

label.name: Biographical History
label.description: Record information relevant to the understanding of the life, activities, and relationships of the person or family.

label.name: Places of residence
label.description: Indicate the geographical place(s) of residence of the person or family and the length of residence in each place, as well as any other place with which the person or family has a connection.

label.name: Education
label.description: Record information about the formal education of persons, including members of families whose education is important to an understanding of their life.

label.name: Occupation
label.description: Record information about the principal occupation(s) and career or lifework of persons or about the activities of families. Also indicate any other activities important to an understanding of the life of the person or family.

label.name: Other Significant Information
label.description: Record any other important information not recorded elsewhere in the biographical history.

label.name: Administrative History
label.description: Give information relevant to the understanding of the creator's functions, activities, and relations with other corporate bodies.

label.name: Dates of Founding and/or Dissolution
label.description: Give the date and place of the founding of the corporate body, and if applicable the date and place of its dissolution.

label.name: Geographical Areas
label.description: Give the location of the head office and of any branch or regional offices as well as the geographic region in which the organization operated.

label.name: Mandate
label.description: Record the enabling legislation or other legal policy instrument(s) that act as the source of authority for the corporate body in terms of its powers, responsibilities, or sphere of activities, including any significant changes in its authority and functions.

label.name: Functions
label.description: Record information about the functions and activities performed by the corporate body being described.

label.name: Administrative Structure
label.description: Describe the internal structure of the corporate body and the dates of any changes to the structure that are significant to the understanding of the way the corporate body conducts its affairs.

label.name: Predecessor and Successor Bodies
label.description: Give the facts of the relationship of the body with predecessor or successor bodies to its mandate, functions, or activities.

label.name: Names of Chief Officers
label.description: Record the personal name(s) of persons holding the position as chief officer

label.name: Predecessor and Successor Bodies
label.description: Give the facts of the relationship of the body with predecessor or successor bodies to its mandate, functions, or activities.

label.name: Library of Congress Names Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Topical Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Geographic Areas Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Custodial History
label.description: This element provides information on changes of ownership or custody of the material being described, from the time it left the possession of the creator until it was acquired by the repository that is significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

label.name: Immediate Source of Acquisition
label.description: Record information about changes of ownership or custody of the materials being described that do not involve direct acquisition by the repository and that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation in the Custodial History Element.

label.name: Appraisal
label.description: This element provides information about the rationale for appraisal decisions, destruction actions, and disposition schedules that are relevant to the understanding and use of the materials being described.

label.name: Accruals
label.description: This element informs the user of anticipated additions to the unit being described. An accrual is an acquisition of archival materials additional to that already in the custody of the repository.

role.name: Administrators
role.description: Confers actions needed by those administering the system

role.name: Cataloguers
role.description: Confers actions needed by those editing catalogue entries

role.name: Researcher
role.description: Allows users to only search and view - but not edit - catalogue entries

role.name: User content moderator
role.description: Allows users to moderate user generated tags and comments

group.description: Users who can add and edit catalogue entries
